snippet: The company said it would apply for approval to use palbociclib with a drug called Femara, or letrozole, as an initial treatment for postmenopausal women with a certain type of advanced breast cancer.
abstract: Pfizer says Food and Drug Administration will allow it to apply for approval of its heavily promoted experimental breast cancer medicine based on midstage patient testing results.
lead_paragraph: The company said it would apply for approval to use palbociclib with a drug called Femara, or letrozole, as an initial treatment for postmenopausal women with a certain type of advanced breast cancer.

headline.main: Pfizer to Apply for Breast Cancer Drug Approval
headline.print_headline: Pfizer to Apply for Breast Cancer Drug Approval
